</title>

<traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 64</row>

**Price** 20 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This long, hollow tube is held in two hands and braced over the shoulder. Inside, it contains a small metal basket sized to hold [alchemical bombs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-bombs). A chute in the top delivers an alchemical bomb into the internal basket, while a lever on the underside pulls the basket back and locks it in place. Loading an alchemical bomb into a bomb launcher requires a single Interact action. With a pull of a trigger, the basket speeds forward, allowing you to Strike with the loaded alchemical bomb over long distances. Bombs fired with a bomb launcher have a [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) of 60 feet.
